entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Greenstone (Nakina)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:15 p.m. EDT Thursday 13 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few rain showers beginning this evening then changing to snow or ice pellets after midnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 7:10 PM EDT Thursday 13 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Ice pellets mixed with freezing rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Ice pellets or freezing rain ending near noon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers. Local ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 7. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 7:10 PM EDT Thursday 13 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of freezing rain. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of freezing rain overnight. Wind east 20 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 7:10 PM EDT Thursday 13 April 2023
